text: Claire Rhiannon Holt (born 11 June 1988) is an Australian actress who acts in both movies and television. She was born in Gold Coast, Australia. She is known for playing Emma Gilbert in H2O: Just Add Water and for playing Rebekah Mikaelson in both The Vampire Diaries and The Originals. ==Other websites== * *https://www.fernsehserien.tv/serien-mit-claire-holt.shtml Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from Brisbane
title: Claire Holt
